text: Today We Live is a 1933 American World War I romantic drama movie directed by Howard Hawks and is based on the 1932 story Turnabout by William Faulkner. It stars Joan Crawford, Gary Cooper, Robert Young, Franchot Tone and was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1933 romantic drama movies Category:1933 war movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:American war movies Category:World War I movies Category:Movies based on books Category:MGM movies Category:Movies directed by Howard Hawks Category:Movies directed by Richard Rosson Category:Movies set in England
title: Today We Live
